summary: A collection of test modules for the cover image storage system, providing utilities for locating files in tar archives, verifying image path resolution, serving, resizing, and writing of cover images, executing doctests on documentation examples, and performing integration tests of the web application with mock database objects and HTTP request handling.
business_intent: Ensure the coverstore component reliably stores, retrieves, resizes, and serves book cover images and that its web API correctly interacts with the database, supporting consistent image handling for the library platform.
